page.title: 13SPORT AND LEISURE (Cont.)
page.content:
{ The continental barge has a transparent roof over it.It has comfortable beds-if you want to sleep the night.It also has food around candle-lit tables aswell as a bar for drinking.
FISHING
People like to go fishing for fun, pleasure,or to cure boredom.There are many competitions for fishing,and the winners are the one's who catch either the biggest fish or the most fish.If the fish weigh under one pound,you have to throw them back into the water and let them go.If they weigh over a pound then the choice is optional to you as to whether you keep them or throw them back.The name of the river is the'River Aire'.
